entrance.name: Entrance Hall
entrance.description: You stand in the foyer of Chad Lindemood's interactive resume. Exits lead north to About, east to Skills, west to Experience, south to Contact.

about.name: About
about.description: Chad Lindemood is an IT professional specializing in cloud and systems administration, endpoint management, and network security.

skills.name: Skills
skills.description: Cloud & Systems: Azure, Active Directory, Windows Server, VMware ESXi. Endpoint Management: Intune, Autopilot, PowerShell. Networking & Security: SonicWall, Sophos, VPN, UniFi, Veeam. Collaboration: Microsoft Teams Rooms, Office Suite.

education.name: Education
education.description: Western Governors University – B.S. Cloud Computing (expected Dec 2024). ACI Learning – Tech Bootcamp, Computer User Support Specialist Program (Sep 2022).

experience.name: Experience
experience.description: A career spanning Tier 2 Escalations and Field Technician roles at Computer Technology Managed Services, IT Service Desk Technician at EXOS IT, and service as a Signals Intelligence Analyst in the U.S. Air Force. A passage leads north to Projects.

contact.name: Contact
contact.description: Connect with Chad at chad.lindemood@gmail.com or (765) 470-3525 in Canal Fulton, OH.

certifications.name: Certifications
certifications.description: Microsoft Azure Administrator (AZ-104), AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner, CompTIA A+, Network+, Security+, ITIL 4.

projects.name: Projects
projects.description: PowerShell scripts for device tracking and Chrome bookmark backup streamline IT operations.
